2078220.name: No King No Kingdom - Altar of War
2078220.description:
Prepare yourself for the ultimate challenge of your power and ruling skills. The Altar of War will bring waves of powerful enemies to your land. Thus, make sure to raise large army and to build strong defences to withstand the mighty foe.

The challenge begins with building the Altar of War. It allows you to start the Invasion Event whenever you feel ready. It brings a certain amount of enemy waves, which you need to withstand.

After completing the Invasion Event, you receive various rewards like resources, units, dragons and artifacts.

With each victory, The Altar of War moves to the next level. It brings stronger enemies and in larger quantities during the next Invasion Events. There is no max level. Show us how far you can get by taking part in The Altar of War Leaderboard!

The Altar of War brings a previously unseen foe. The Endrian is coming for your Kingdom. This entity is far elder than gods. Grab all your forces to take Endrian down. Its powerful attacks can vaporize your troops with a single ultimate blow. Besides, its power increases with every Invasion level.

The appearance of Endiran brings a brand new artifact to this world. The Shard of Endrian Core releases an enormous amount of energy and destroys enemies in a large area.

Special thanks to 1frogy1 and Krazycris for their great support
2078220.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 法语, 德语, 泰语, 土耳其语, 保加利亚语, 丹麦语, 芬兰语, 匈牙利语, 韩语, 波兰语
